title: Creator element schema
description: Creator element schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.5.38

propertyDescriptions.creatorRole: The role of the creator in bringing the described dataset into existence.
propertyDescriptions.creatorType: The type of the creator of the described dataset (organization, person, or system).
propertyDescriptions.creatorEmail: An email address of the creator.

propertyDescriptions.creatorName: The full name of the creator.
propertyDescriptions.creatorGivenName: If the creator is a person, the personal name(s) of the creator (e.g., first and optionally middle name in Western languagues, optionally middle and last name in Asian languages).
propertyDescriptions.creatorFamilyName: If the creator is a person, the surname(s) of the creator (e.g., last name in Western languagues, first name in Asian languages).

creatorName.title: creatorName schema
creatorName.schema:name: creatorName
creatorName.schema:description: The full name of the creator.

items.title: creatorGivenName schema
items.schema:name: creatorGivenName
items.schema:description: If the creator is a person, the personal name(s) of the creator (e.g., first and optionally middle name in Western languagues, optionally middle and last name in Asian languages).

items.title: creatorFamilyName schema
items.schema:name: creatorFamilyName
items.schema:description: If the creator is a person, the surname(s) of the creator (e.g., last name in Western languagues, first name in Asian languages).

propertyDescriptions.creatorIdentifier: Globally unique string that identifies the creator (an individual, legal entity or system).
propertyDescriptions.creatorIdentifierScheme: The name of the scheme or authority used for the Creator Identifier.

creatorIdentifier.title: creatorIdentifier schema
creatorIdentifier.schema:name: creatorIdentifier
creatorIdentifier.schema:description: Globally unique string that identifies the creator (an individual, legal entity or system).

creatorIdentifierScheme.title: creatorIdentifierScheme schema
creatorIdentifierScheme.schema:name: creatorIdentifierScheme
creatorIdentifierScheme.schema:description: The name of the scheme or authority used for the Creator Identifier.

propertyDescriptions.creatorAffiliation: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the creator.
propertyDescriptions.creatorAffiliationIdentifier: Globally unique string that identifies the organizational affiliation of the creator.
propertyDescriptions.creatorAffiliationIdentifierScheme: The name of the scheme or authority used for the Creator Affiliation Identifier.

creatorAffiliation.title: creatorAffiliation schema
creatorAffiliation.schema:name: creatorAffiliation
creatorAffiliation.schema:description: The organizational or institutional affiliation of the creator.

creatorAffiliationIdentifier.title: creatorAffiliationIdentifier schema
creatorAffiliationIdentifier.schema:name: creatorAffiliationIdentifier
creatorAffiliationIdentifier.schema:description: Globally unique string that identifies the organizational affiliation of the creator.

creatorAffiliationIdentifierScheme.title: creatorAffiliationIdentifierScheme schema
creatorAffiliationIdentifierScheme.schema:name: creatorAffiliationIdentifierScheme
creatorAffiliationIdentifierScheme.schema:description: The name of the scheme or authority used for the Creator Affiliation Identifier.

items.schema:name: creatorRole
items.schema:description: The role of the creator in bringing the described dataset into existence.

creatorType.schema:name: creatorType
creatorType.schema:description: The type of the creator of the described dataset (organization, person, or system).

items.title: creatorEmail field schema
items.description: creatorEmail field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.5.38
items.schema:name: creatorEmail
items.schema:description: An email address of the creator.

schema:name: Creator
schema:description: An entity that brought into existence the dataset being described. Creators can be people, organizations and/or physical or virtual infrastructure (e.g., sensors, software).
